borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Non-material amendments to planning permission Ref: 2023/01965/VAR dated 21 August 2024 for "Planning application under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act (1990) seeking variations of Planning Conditions pursuant to planning permission Ref: 2021/02896/VAR (dated September 2022) for amendments to the vertical and horizontal parameters of Phase 4 (Condition 3), amendments to Design Codes (Condition 4) and amendments to the maximum floorspace (Condition 8). The proposals will result in the demolition of all existing buildings and structures and redevelopment of the site for residential and mixed uses comprising the erection of new buildings ranging from 11-35 storeys to provide up to 2,030 residential units (Class C3) and use classes E, F1, F2 and sui generis (drinking establishment and takeaway), the provision of a new publicly accessible open space, new pedestrian and vehicle routes, accesses and amenity areas, basement level car park with integral servicing areas and other associated works." Proposed amendments seek to vary Condition 4 of planning permission ref. 2023/1965/VAR with changes to the design code relating to the height of the base component on Building C1 (reduced from 9m to 6m) and the removal of glazed terracotta as the primary facing material on Building C1.
